ui.panel.lovelace.cards.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this card?
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.actions.action_c: Are you sure you want to run action ''{action}''?
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.actions.no_entit: No entity provided for more info dialog
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.empty_state.no_d: This page allows you to control your devices, however it looks like you have no devices set up yet. Head to the integrations page to get started.
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.iframe.error_sec: Nije moguće učitati iframe koji pokazuju na Veb lokacije koristeći {target_protocol} ako je Home Assistant serviran preko {context_protocol}.
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.safe-mode.descri: Home Assistant ran into trouble while loading your configuration and is now running in safe mode. Take a look at the error log to see what went wrong.
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.starting.descrip: Home Assistant is starting, please wait…
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.energy.no_data: Nema podataka za prikazivanje. Novim podacima može biti potrebno do 2 sata da stignu nakon što konfigurišete kontrolnu tablu za energiju.
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.energy.solar_con: Ova kartica ukazuje na to koliko je solarne energije koju ste proizveli koristio vaš dom umesto da bude vraćen u mrežu.

Ako je ovaj broj obično veoma nizak, što ukazuje na višak solarne proizvodnje, možda bi trebalo da razmislite o punjenju kućne baterije ili električnog automobila iz solarnih panela u vreme velike solarne proizvodnje.
Samoutrošena solarna energija nije mogla biti izračunata
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.energy.grid_neut: Ova kartica prikazuje vaše neto korišćenje energije.
Ako je igla u ljubičastoj boji, vratili ste više energije u mrežu nego što ste konzumirali iz nje. Ako je u plavom, potrošili ste više energije iz mreže nego što ste vratili.
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.energy.energy_di: Idite na kontrolnu tablu za energiju
ui.panel.lovelace.cards.energy.carbon_co: Ova kartica ukazuje na to koliko je energije koju je utrošio vaš dom generisano korišćenjem ne-fosilnih goriva kao što su solarna, vetar i nuklearna. Što više, to bolje!
Consumed low-carbon energy couldn't be calculated
Potrošena ne-fosilna energija nemože biti izračunata
ui.panel.lovelace.unused_entities.title: Unused entities
ui.panel.lovelace.unused_entities.availa: These are the entities that you have available, but are not in your dashboard yet.
ui.panel.lovelace.unused_entities.select: Select the entities you want to add to a card and then click the add card button.
ui.panel.lovelace.add_entities.yaml_unsu: You cannot use this function when using your dashboard in YAML mode.
ui.panel.lovelace.add_entities.generated: You can only use this function when you have taken control of your dashboard.
ui.panel.lovelace.views.confirm_delete_t: Are you sure you want to delete your ''{name}'' view?
ui.panel.lovelace.views.confirm_delete_e: Deleting this view will also remove the cards
Are you sure you want to delete your ''{name}'' view? The view contains {number} cards that will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
ui.panel.lovelace.reload_resources.refre: You have to refresh the page to complete the reload. Do you want to refresh now?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.raw_editor.head: Edit Configuration
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.raw_editor.love: Your dashboard was updated, do you want to load the updated config in the editor and lose your current changes?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.raw_editor.conf: Are you sure you want to remove your dashboard configuration?
We will automatically generate your dashboard views with your areas and devices if you remove your dashboard configuration.
You have unsaved changes, are you sure you want to exit?
Your configuration might contains comment(s), these will not be saved. Do you want to continue?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.raw_editor.reso: Resources should no longer be added to the dashboard configuration but can be added in the dashboard config panel.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.edit_lovelace.e: This title is shown above all your views in the dashboard.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.edit_view.visib: Select which users should see this view in the navigation
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.edit_view.subvi: Subviews don't appear in tabs and have a back button.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.edit_badges.vie: Trenutni tip prikaza ne podržava značke.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.edit_card.pick_: Which card would you like to add?
Which card would you like to add to your {name} view?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.edit_card.confi: Are you sure you want to cancel?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.move_card.heade: Choose a view to move the card to
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.suggest_card.he: We created a suggestion for you
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.save_config.par: This dashboard is currently being maintained by Home Assistant. It is automatically updated when new entities or dashboard components become available. If you take control, this dashboard will no longer be automatically updated. You can always create a new dashboard in configuration to play around with.
Are you sure you want to take control of your user interface?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.save_config.yam: You are using YAML mode for this dashboard, which means you cannot change your dashboard config from the UI. If you want to manage this dashboard from the UI, remove 'mode: yaml' from your dashboard configuration in 'configuration.yaml.'.
To take control in YAML mode, create a YAML file with the name you specified in your config for this dashboard, or the default 'ui-lovelace.yaml'.
To help you start here is the current config of this dashboard:
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.migrate.para_no: This element doesn't have an ID. Please add an ID to this element in 'ui-lovelace.yaml'.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.migrate.para_mi: Home Assistant can add IDs to all your cards and views automatically for you by pressing the 'Migrate configuration' button.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.alarm-pane: The Alarm Panel card allows you to arm and disarm your alarm control panel integrations.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.area.name: Oblast
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.area.descr: Kartica "Oblast" automatski prikazuje entitete određene oblasti.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.area.show_: Prikaži snimak kamere umesto slike oblasti
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.calendar.d: The Calendar card displays a calendar including day, week and list views
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.conditiona: The Conditional card displays another card based on entity states.
The card will be shown when ALL conditions below are fulfilled.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.entities.d: The Entities card is the most common type of card. It groups items together into lists.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.entities.e: View the details of this row by clicking the edit button
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.entity.des: The Entity card gives you a quick overview of your entity's state.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.button.des: The Button card allows you to add buttons to perform tasks.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.button.def: The default action depends on the entity's capabilities, it will either be toggled or the more info dialog will be shown.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.entity-fil: The Entity Filter card allows you to define a list of entities that you want to track only when in a certain state.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.gauge.name: Gauge
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.gauge.desc: The Gauge card is a basic card that allows visually seeing sensor data.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.glance.des: The Glance card is useful to group multiple sensors in a compact overview.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.grid.name: Grid
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.grid.descr: The Grid card allows you to show multiple cards in a grid.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.logbook.de: The Logbook card shows a list of events for entities.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.history-gr: The History Graph card allows you to display a graph for each of the entities listed.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.statistics: The Statistics Graph card allows you to display a graph of the statistics for each of the entities listed.
The Statistic card allows you to display a statistical value of an entity of a certain period.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.horizontal: The Horizontal Stack card allows you to stack together multiple cards, so they always sit next to each other in the space of one column.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.humidifier: The Humidifier card gives control of your humidifier entity. Allowing you to change the humidity and mode of the entity.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.iframe.des: The Webpage card allows you to embed your favorite webpage right into Home Assistant.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.light.name: Light
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.light.desc: The Light card allows you to change the brightness of the light.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.generic.ma: Need to add a custom card or just want to manually write the YAML?
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.map.name: Map
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.map.descri: The Map card that allows you to display entities on a map.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.markdown.d: The Markdown card is used to render Markdown.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.media-cont: The Media Control card is used to display media player entities on an interface with easy to use controls.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.picture.de: The Picture card allows you to set an image to use for navigation to various paths in your interface or to call a service.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.picture-el: The Picture Elements card is one of the most versatile types of cards. The cards allow you to position icons or text and even services! On an image based on coordinates.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.picture-en: The Picture Entity card displays an entity in the form of an image. Instead of images from URL, it can also show the picture of camera entities.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.picture-gl: The Picture Glance card shows an image and corresponding entity states as an icon. The entities on the right side allow toggle actions, others show the more info dialog.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.plant-stat: The Plant Status card is for all the lovely botanists out there.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.sensor.des: The Sensor card gives you a quick overview of your sensors state with an optional graph to visualize change over time.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.shopping-l: The Shopping List card allows you to add, edit, check-off, and clear items from your shopping list.
This card requires the `shopping_list` integration to be set up.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.thermostat: The Thermostat card gives control of your climate entity. Allowing you to change the temperature and mode of the entity.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.tile.name: Tile
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.tile.descr: The tile card gives you a quick overview of your entity. The card allow you to toggle the entity, show the more info dialog or custom actions.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.tile.extra: No compatible extras available for this entity
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.vertical-s: The Vertical Stack card allows you to group multiple cards so they always sit in the same column.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.card.weather-fo: The Weather Forecast card displays the weather. Very useful to include on interfaces that people display on the wall.
ui.panel.lovelace.editor.view.panel_mode: This view contains more than one card, but a panel view can only show 1 card.
ui.panel.lovelace.warning.starting: Home Assistant is starting, not everything may be available yet
ui.panel.lovelace.changed_toast.message: Your dashboard was updated. Refresh to see changes?
